You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &uring;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Uring;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/016e/index.htm U+0016E].
  * `&uring;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/016f/index.htm U+0016F].
